text: Simplemente María (Simply Maria) may refer to: *Simplemente María (1969 telenovela), Peruvian *Simplemente María (1972 telenovela), Venezuelan *Simplemente María (1989 telenovela), Mexican *Simplemente María (2015 telenovela), Mexican telenovela based on Simplemente María of 1989 and produced by Ignacio Sada
title: Simplemente María
